title: riot redeeming codes
body: i just took a code from the sales person and they say the code is already redeemed can someone help me and i tryed this on several  accounts it says the code is already redeemed and then you have exceeded the maximumu number of limits... please helpp

replies.body:
I'm not really surprised. The other year when I bought the championship Thresh figurine, the code that came with it was already used (I owned it already, so gave it to a friend).

Botnets can brute-force codes like that pretty effectively. Scripts can easily be used to relog into different accounts and even refresh IP addresses to bypass protections against it.

We're happy to look into your specific issue with the prepaid card.  Contact us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will work with you individually to see what's going on.  We'll reply to your ticket asap!
